typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ETL_PROC_WID as decimal(undefined,undefined),
		ROW_WID as decimal(undefined,undefined)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> input
input pivot(groupBy(ROW_WID),
	pivotBy(ETL_PROC_WID),
	{} = sum(),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(input(
		name as string,
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
